Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial skeleton app with agent infrastructure

- Set up Next.js 14 with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and ESLint
- Added Vitest and Playwright for testing
- Created agent infrastructure directories and config files
- Added 5 agent command files \(test-plan, test-build, test-execute, code-review, merge-feature\)
- Created health API endpoint and Button component for testing
- Added CLAUDE.md with project rules and boot sequence

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Update Tailwind CSS v4 configuration

- Install @tailwindcss/postcss for Tailwind v4 compatibility
- Update postcss.config.js to use new plugin
- Update globals.css to use @import syntax

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add test infrastructure and validate agent framework

- Add API tests for health endpoint \(5 tests, all passing\)
- Configure ESLint 9 with flat config for TypeScript/React
- Fix Vitest setup for jest-dom matchers compatibility
- Run all 5 agents successfully \(test-plan, test-build, test-execute, code-review, merge-feature\)
- Update truth file: health feature now at 50% coverage

Phase 0 agent infrastructure validation complete.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
